titleStmt.title: A Christian new-years gift or exhortations to the chief duties of a Christian: Written in Latine by Harbot. Grimstone, Esquire, one of the members of the House of Commons in Parliament. Translated for the more publick benefit.
titleStmt.author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Daniel, printer to the University of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
